bike.description: FACT 9m carbon front triangle, 29" geometry, FACT TM construction, M5 rear triangle, tapered headtube, carbon PF30 BB, full internal shift/brake/post routing, 142mm dropouts, sealed cartridge bearing pivots, replaceable derailleur hanger, 110mm travel
